definition: to remain fresh in one's memory (idiom)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: And while that swim took place three years ago, I can remember it as if it was yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 尽管那次经历已是三年以前，但我至今记忆犹新。

sentences.english: Japan has long memory of American nuclear attack on Japan in WW2.
sentences.chinese: 日本人对2战时美国的核攻击可是记忆犹新。

sentences.english: Ansip said that his memory of last visit to China two years ago is still fresh and he was deeply impressed by the rapid growth, and the long history and culture of China.
sentences.chinese: 安西普说，他对两年前的中国之行记忆犹新。

sentences.english: And in this national cemetery , it is another day when grief remains fresh.
sentences.chinese: 在这个国家公墓里，它将会哀思仍记忆犹新的一天。

sentences.english: I am glad to meet you again, Miss Li. I still remember our last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴我同李女士再次相见，我对上次相见记忆犹新。

sentences.english: I was only three, but I remember two things clearly.
sentences.chinese: 那时我只有三岁，不过有两件事我至今记忆犹新。

sentences.english: My mother, who does not tweet, also remarked on Watson’s speed.
sentences.chinese: 我不会发推的妈妈也对华生的速度记忆犹新。

sentences.english: Afternoon classes in particular, team activities, let me remember.
sentences.chinese: 特别是下午的班队活动，让我记忆犹新。

sentences.english: At night, zhaoqing alone at the bow, the past oscillated memory.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，肇庆单独彷徨在船头，往事记忆犹新。

sentences.english: Time has passed, but the memories do not fade.
Every little detail of those mornings is still clear to me.
sentences.chinese: 早晨送报的每个细节至今仍记忆犹新。

sentences.english: Well do I remember the day when I joined the League.
sentences.chinese: 我对入团的那一天还记忆犹新。

sentences.english: It is well wihtin the memory of old men living today.
sentences.chinese: 今天还活着的老年人对这事记忆犹新。

sentences.english: I still remember the day 12 years ago when my daughter was born.
sentences.chinese: 至今我仍对12年前女儿出生的那个日子记忆犹新。
我总是对此事记忆犹新。

definition: to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
